article_title: Waldo man, one of The New York Times’ top 10 commenters: ‘Finally, somebody is listening to me’
article_text:
Bruce Rozenblit submits one to three comments a day on The New York Times’ website

He was included this week in a feature story about The Times’ most prolific and popular commenters

“Anyone can rant,” he said. “I like thoughtful analysis”

article_metadata.news-keywords: New York Times, commenters, Waldo, Kansas City, Bruce Rozenblit, website comments
